section.name: Description of the module analysis.js
section.p: This module contains functions to automate analysis at ENS microarray plateform
createLists is used to create 2 files from a bioassay with all the genes that are upregulated and downregulated.

section.name: Functions
section.source: /* * Create up and down list from bioAssay * @param ba BioAssay * @param threshold absolute value of the threshold * @param fileUp File used to save the up list * @param fileDown File used to save the down list * @return nothing */ function createLists(ba, threshold, fileUp, fileDown);
section.p: sortTotalSummary is used to create file at the total.summary format that is sorted by descending M, and then by descending A.
section.source: /* * Sort a total summary bioAssay by descending M, and * then by descending A. The result bioAssay is writen in a file. * @param ba The bioAssay * @param file File to write * @return nothing */ function sortTotalSummary(ba, file);
